summary: This mod changes money from being called "gold" to "septim".I have also added a tiny bit of weight to them because i found it was silly that you could carry a million gold on you and act like you have 0. I have changed it to 0.0001 weight on each septim.
descriptionHtml: This mod changes money from being called "gold" to "septim".I have also added a tiny bit of weight to them because i found it was silly that you could carry a million gold on you and act like you have 0. I have changed it to 0.0001 weight on each septim.
author: Jorror1
